actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.

official_title: A resolution to amend the Rules of the House of Representatives to establish an optional expedited procedure for mark-up of legislation, subject to certain restrictions.

summary.text: Amends the Rules of the House of Representatives to permit a committee, by majority vote, to consider a measure as read and open to amendment, for the purpose of markup if such measure has been delivered to each Member of such committee seven days prior to that time.

titles.title: A resolution to amend the Rules of the House of Representatives to establish an optional expedited procedure for mark-up of legislation, subject to certain restrictions.
